title: The Billionaire's Challenge
description: When Mia Harrison agreed to participate in the Auction a Secretary for Charity party, she wasn't expecting anything more than a bit of extra overtime on her paycheck. But when Mia is won by sexy billionaire Garret Fabel, she's given more than just a night out on the town.This book is intended for mature audiences only and contains explicit sexual acts.Estimated Length: 12,200 wordsExcerpt: His erection pressed against my pencil skirt, and I quickly reached back to unzip it and slid it down my thighs, wanting nothing more than to feel his sex between my legs.
author: K. Matthew
